thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Alan S
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Alan S

author: Alan S
title: Alan S
text:
Easy to use and Japan Rail staff always helpful. Two points to note. 1. Do not go through the gates but always use the entrance that is manned by J Rail staff. 2. Actually this is an advantage as I always asked which platform to "wherever we were going" - they always were very helpful.
My only negative was the queue to convert the pass I was given in Australia to a Japan Rail Pass once I arrived at Narita airport. Only time we ever had to queue up (as we had green passes which made life really easy) but it was a long wait.
